title: how does xp work
body: how does the xp after a match scale i just went  50 4 1 and only got 339 xp

replies.body: XP Gains are mostly decided by the length of the match, winning/losing, and the type of match it was (SR, ARAM, RGM)

Experience gained is most heavily based on the duration of the game, and whether it was a win or a loss. Obviously, the longer the game is, the larger the gains. And winning a game rewards you more than losing. You say only 339 xp, but assuming you didn't have any boosts active, that sounds like a good amount to me.
